00407 class uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base : public uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base {
00408 public:
00409   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base(const char* name_);
00410   virtual ~uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base();
00411   virtual bool is_transmitter() const;
00412   virtual void bind_export(sc_core::sc_export_base* b);
00413   virtual sc_core::sc_interface* get_interface() const;
00414   //
00415 protected:
00416   sc_core::sc_interface* m_iface;
00417 public:
00418   void umsg(std::string f) {
00419         char msg[1024];
00420         sprintf(msg,"uvm function not implemented by receiver: %s",f.c_str());
00421         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_RECEIVER_FUNC_NOT_IMPL_,msg);
00422     }
00423   virtual unsigned put_bitstream(
00424     unsigned stream_size, 
00425     void * stream  ) { umsg("put_bitstream"); return 0; }
00426   virtual void put_bitstream_request(
00427     unsigned call_id, 
00428     unsigned stream_size, 
00429     void * stream
00430   ) { umsg("put_bitstream_request"); }
00431   virtual int try_put_bitstream(
00432     unsigned stream_size , 
00433     void * stream
00434   ) { umsg("try_put_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00435   virtual int can_put() { umsg("can_put"); return 0; } 
00436   //
00437   virtual unsigned get_bitstream(
00438     unsigned* stream_size , 
00439     void * stream
00440   ) { umsg("get_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00441   virtual void get_bitstream_request(
00442     unsigned call_id
00443   ) { umsg("get_bitstream_request"); } 
00444   virtual int try_get_bitstream(
00445     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00446     void * stream
00447   ) { umsg("try_get_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00448   virtual int can_get() { umsg("can_get"); return 0; } 
00449   //
00450   virtual unsigned peek_bitstream(
00451     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00452     void * stream
00453   ) { umsg("peek_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00454   virtual void peek_bitstream_request(
00455     unsigned call_id
00456   ) { umsg("peek_bitstream_request"); } 
00457   virtual int try_peek_bitstream(
00458     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00459     void * stream
00460   ) { umsg("try_peek_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00461   virtual int can_peek() { umsg("can_peek"); return 0; } 
00462   //
00463   virtual unsigned transport_bitstream(
00464     unsigned req_stream_size, 
00465     void * req_stream,
00466     unsigned* rsp_stream_size,
00467     void* rsp_stream
00468   ) { umsg("transport_bitstream"); return 0; }

00470     unsigned call_id, 
00471     unsigned req_stream_size, 
00472     void * req_stream,

00475   ) { umsg("transport_bitstream_request"); }
00476   virtual void write_bitstream(
00477     unsigned stream_size , 
00478     void * stream
00479   ) { umsg("write_bitstream"); return; } 
00480 };

00513 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00514 class uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm :
00515   virtual public uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base,
00516   virtual public tlm::tlm_master_if<T1,T2>,
00517   virtual public tlm::tlm_slave_if<T2,T1>
00518 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
00519 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
00520   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>
00521 #endif
00522 {
00523 public:
00524   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm(const char* name_) 
00525 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00526     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_), dummy_event("sync", false) 
00527 #else
00528     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_), dummy_event()
00529 #endif 
00530   {}
00531   ~uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm() { }
00532   virtual std::string interface_name() { return "tlm"; } // object->if_name()???
00533   unsigned connId;
00534   unsigned adapterId;
00535 
00536   // the put family
00537 
00538   virtual void put( const T1 &t ) {
00539     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return; }
00540     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00541     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00542     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,v);
00543     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00544     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_put(
00545       connId, v
00546     );
00547     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00548   }
00549 
00550   virtual bool nb_put( const T1 &t ) { 
00551     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00552     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00553     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&v);
00554     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00555     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_put(
00556       connId, &v
00557     );
00558     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00559   }
00560 
00561   virtual bool nb_can_put( tlm::tlm_tag<T1> *t = 0 ) const { 
00562     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00563     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00564     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_put(connId);
00565     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00566   }
00567 
00568   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_put( tlm::tlm_tag<T1> *t = 0 ) const 
00569   {
00570       char msg[1024];
00571       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_put' \n");
00572         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00573         return dummy_event;
00574   }
00575   // the get family
00576 
00577   virtual T2 get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *tag = 0 ) {
00578     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return T2(); }
00579     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00580     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00581     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00582     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00583     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_get(
00584       connId, v
00585     );
00586     T2* t;
00587     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(v, t, t);
00588     T2 tt = *t;
00589     delete t;
00590     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00591     return tt;
00592   }
00593 
00594   virtual bool nb_get( T2 &t ) { 
00595     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00596 
00597     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00598     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(&v);
00599     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00600     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_get(
00601       connId, &v
00602     );
00603     if (ret == 0) {
00604       // do not touch the input argument
00605       return false;
00606     }
00607     T2* t1;
00608     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&v, t1, t1);
00609     t = *t1;
00610     delete t1;
00611     return true;
00612   }
00613 
00614   virtual bool nb_can_get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const { 
00615     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00616     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00617     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_get(connId);
00618     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00619   }
00620 
00621   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const
00622   {
00623       char msg[1024];
00624       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_get' \n");
00625       uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00626       return dummy_event;
00627   }
00628   // the peek family
00629 
00630   virtual T2 peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *tag = 0 ) const { 
00631     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return T2(); }
00632     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00633     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00634     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00635     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00636     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_peek(
00637       connId, v
00638     );
00639     T2* t;
00640     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(v, t, t);
00641     T2 tt = *t;
00642     delete t;
00643     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00644     return tt;
00645   }
00646 
00647   virtual bool nb_peek( T2 &t ) const { 
00648     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00649 
00650     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00651     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(&v);
00652     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00653     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_peek(
00654       connId, &v
00655     );
00656     if (ret == 0) {
00657       // do not touch the input argument
00658       return false;
00659     }
00660     T2* t1;
00661     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&v, t1, t1);
00662     t = *t1;
00663     delete t1;
00664     return true;
00665   }
00666 
00667   virtual bool nb_can_peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const { 
00668     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00669     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00670     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_peek(connId);
00671     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00672   }
00673 
00674   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const {
00675       char msg[1024];
00676       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_peek' \n");
00677       uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00678       return dummy_event;
00679   }
00680 
00681   // analysis_if
00682 
00683   virtual void write( const T1 &t ) { 
00684     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return; }
00685 
00686     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00687     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&v);
00688     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00689     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::write(
00690       connId, &v
00691     );
00692   }
00693 
00694 protected:
00695   sc_event dummy_event;
00696 };
00697 
00703 template <typename REQ, typename RSP>
00704 class uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport :
00705   virtual public uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base,
00706   virtual public tlm::tlm_transport_if<REQ,RSP>
00707 {
00708 public:
00709   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport(const char* name_) 
00710     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_) { 
00711   }
00712   ~uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport() { }
00713   virtual std::string interface_name() { return "tlm"; } // object->if_name()???
00714   unsigned connId;
00715   unsigned adapterId;
00716   //
00717   virtual RSP transport( const REQ &t ) { 
00718     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return RSP(); }
00719     //uvm_ml_packed_obj req, rsp;
00720     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00721     uvm_ml_packed_obj* req = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00722     uvm_ml_packed_obj* rsp = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00723     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(rsp);
00724     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,req);
00725     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00726     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_transport(
00727       connId, req, rsp
00728     );
00729     RSP* t1;
00730     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(rsp, t1, t1);
00731     RSP tt = *t1;
00732     delete t1;
00733     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(req);
00734     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(rsp);
00735     return tt;
00736   }
00737 };
00738 
00740 
00746 template <typename T1, typename T2> class uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm
00747     : public uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base
00748 {
00749 public:
00750 
00751 
00752   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm(const char* nm) 
00753     : uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base(nm) { m_init_done = false; }
00754   ~uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm() { } 
00755   void init_interfaces() {
00756     if (m_init_done) return;
00757     iface_put = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_put_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00758     iface_get = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_get_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00759     iface_peek = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_peek_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00760     iface_nb_put = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_put_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00761     iface_nb_get = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00762     iface_nb_peek = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_peek_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00763     iface_transport = DCAST<tlm::tlm_transport_if<T1,T2>*>(get_interface());
00764 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
00765 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
00766     iface_analysis = DCAST<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00767 #endif
00768     m_init_done = true;
00769   }
00770   unsigned put_bitstream(
00771     unsigned stream_size, 
00772     void * stream
00773                          ){ 
00774     init_interfaces();
00775     if (!iface_put) { 
00776         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00777       return 0; 
00778     }
00779     T1* t;
00780     //
00781     //uvm_ml_packed_obj vt; 
00782     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00783     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00784     //
00785     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
00786     iface_put->put(*t);
00787     delete t;
00788     return 0;
00789   } 
00790 #define UMSGU(f) \
00791   { \
00792   char msg[1024]; \
00793   sprintf(msg,"uvm function not implemented by receiver: %s",#f); \
00794   uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_RECEIVER_FUNC_NOT_IMPL_,msg);         \
00795   }
00796 
00797   void put_bitstream_request(
00798     unsigned call_id, 
00799     unsigned stream_size, 
00800     void * stream
00801                              ) { 
00802     UMSGU(put_bitstream_request); 
00803   } 
00804 
00805   int try_put_bitstream(
00806     unsigned stream_size , 
00807     void * stream
00808   ){ 
00809     init_interfaces();
00810     if (!iface_nb_put) { 
00811         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00812       return 0; 
00813     }
00814     T1* t;
00815     //
00816     //uvm_ml_packed_obj vt; 
00817     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00818     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00819     //
00820     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
00821     int i = iface_nb_put->nb_put(*t);
00822     delete t;
00823     return i;
00824   }
00825   int can_put()  {
00826     init_interfaces();
00827     if (!iface_nb_put) { 
00828         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00829       return 0; 
00830     }
00831     int i = iface_nb_put->nb_can_put();
00832     return i;
00833   }
00834   //
00835   unsigned get_bitstream(
00836     unsigned* stream_size,
00837     void * stream
00838   ) { 
00839     init_interfaces();
00840     if (!iface_get) { 
00841         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00842       return 0; 
00843     }
00844     T2 t;
00845     t = iface_get->get();
00846 
00847     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00848     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00849     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00850     return 0; // ???
00851   }
00852 
00853   void get_bitstream_request(
00854     unsigned call_id
00855                              ) { UMSGU(get_bitstream_request); } 
00856   int try_get_bitstream(
00857     unsigned * stream_size,
00858     void * stream
00859     )  { 
00860     init_interfaces();
00861     if (!iface_nb_get) { 
00862         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00863       return 0; 
00864     }
00865     T2 t;
00866     bool b = iface_nb_get->nb_get(t);
00867 
00868     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00869     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00870     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00871     return b; 
00872   }
00873 
00874   int can_get()  { 
00875     init_interfaces();
00876     if (!iface_nb_get) { 
00877         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00878       return 0; 
00879     }
00880     T2 t;
00881     //
00882     bool b = iface_nb_get->nb_can_get();
00883     return b ? 1 : 0;
00884   }
00885 
00886   //
00887   unsigned peek_bitstream(
00888     unsigned* stream_size,
00889     void * stream
00890     ) { 
00891     init_interfaces();
00892     if (!iface_peek) { 
00893         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,""); 
00894         return 0; 
00895     }
00896     T2 t;
00897     //
00898     t = iface_peek->peek();
00899 
00900     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00901     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00902     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00903     return 0; // ???
00904   } 
00905   void peek_bitstream_request(
00906     unsigned call_id
00907   ) { UMSGU(peek_bitstream_request); } 
00908   int try_peek_bitstream(
00909     unsigned * stream_size,
00910     void * stream
00911   ) { 
00912     init_interfaces();
00913     if (!iface_nb_peek) { 
00914         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00915       return 0; 
00916     }
00917     T2 t;
00918 
00919     bool b = iface_nb_peek->nb_peek(t);
00920 
00921     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00922     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00923     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00924     return b; 
00925   }
00926 
00927   int can_peek()  { 
00928     init_interfaces();
00929     if (!iface_nb_peek) { 
00930         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00931       return 0; 
00932     }
00933     T2 t;
00934     //
00935     bool b = iface_nb_peek->nb_can_peek();
00936     return b ? 1 : 0;
00937   }
00938   //
00939   virtual unsigned transport_bitstream( 
00940     unsigned req_stream_size,
00941     void* req_stream,
00942     unsigned* rsp_stream_size,
00943     void* rsp_stream
00944     ) {
00945     init_interfaces();
00946     if (!iface_transport) { 
00947         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00948       return 0; 
00949     }
00950     T1* t1;
00951 
00952     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt1 = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00953     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt1,req_stream_size,req_stream);
00954     //
00955     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt1, t1, t1);
00956     //
00957     T2 t2;
00958     t2 = iface_transport->transport(*t1);
00959     delete t1;
00960     //
00961     //
00962     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt2 = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00963     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t2,&vt2);
00964     *rsp_stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt2, rsp_stream);
00965     return 0;
00966   }
00967 
00968   //
00969   void write_bitstream(
00970     unsigned stream_size , 
00971     void * stream
00972                        )  { 
00973 #if (! defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__))
00974     init_interfaces();
00975     if (!iface_analysis) { 
00976         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00977         
00978       return; 
00979     }
00980     T1* t;
00981     //
00982     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00983     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00984     //
00985     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
00986     iface_analysis->write(*t);
00987     delete t;
00988 #endif
00989   }
00990 protected:
00991   bool m_init_done;
00992   tlm::tlm_blocking_put_if<T1>* iface_put;
00993   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_put_if<T1>* iface_nb_put;
00994   tlm::tlm_blocking_get_if<T2>* iface_get;
00995   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T2>* iface_nb_get;
00996   tlm::tlm_blocking_peek_if<T2>* iface_peek;
00997   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_peek_if<T2>* iface_nb_peek;
00998   tlm::tlm_transport_if<T1,T2>* iface_transport;
00999 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
01000 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
01001   tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>* iface_analysis;
01002 #endif
01003 };

01006 #define uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(IF) \
01007 template <typename T, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> \
01008 void uvm_ml_register_internal( \
01009   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::IF<T>,N,POL>* p \
01010 ) { \
01011   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     \
01012   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; \
01013   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>* trans = \
01014     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); \
01015   p->bind(*trans); \
01016   trans->object(p); \
01017   trans->set_intf_name(#IF); \
01018   trans->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01019   trans->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01020 } \
01021  \
01022 template <typename T> \
01023 void uvm_ml_register_internal( \
01024   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::IF<T> >* p \
01025 ) { \
01026   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     \
01027   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; \
01028   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>* rec =  \
01029     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); \
01030   rec->bind_export(p); \
01031   rec->set_intf_name(#IF); \
01032   rec->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01033   rec->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01034 }
01035 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_put_if)
01036 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_put_if)
01037 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_put_if)
01038 
01039 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_get_if)
01040 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_get_if)
01041 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_get_if)
01042 
01043 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_peek_if)
01044 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_peek_if)
01045 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_peek_if)
01046 
01047 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_get_peek_if)
01048 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if)
01049 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_get_peek_if)

01054 template <typename T, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> 
01055 void uvm_ml_register_internal( 
01056   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T>,N,POL>* p 
01057 ) { 
01058   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     
01059   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
01060   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>* trans = 
01061     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); 
01062   p->bind(*trans); 
01063   trans->object(p); 
01064   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if"); 
01065   trans->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01066   trans->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01067 } 
01068

01070 void uvm_ml_register_internal( 
01071   tlm::tlm_analysis_port<T>* p 
01072 ) { 
01073   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     
01074   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
01075   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>* trans = 
01076     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); 
01077   p->bind(*trans); 
01078   trans->object(p); 
01079   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if"); 
01080   trans->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01081   trans->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01082 } 
01083 
01084 template <typename T> 
01085 void uvm_ml_register_internal( 
01086   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T> >* p 
01087 ) { 
01088   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     
01089   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; 
01090   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>* rec =  
01091     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); 
01092   rec->bind_export(p); 
01093   rec->set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if"); 
01094   rec->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01095   rec->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01096 }
